title: England's Jack Grealish has sweet moment with young fan
description: After losing the Euro 2020 Final, England's Jack Grealish shared a heartwarming moment with a young boy.

title: Video evidence shows Afghan commandos executed by Taliban
description: CNN's Anna Coren is in Kabul with new evidence of the atrocities committed by the Taliban as video emerged of Afghan commandos being shot dead after an apparent surrender. The Taliban rejects the video, saying it's fabricated.

title: The 'toxicity' and 'loneliness' of #workingwhileBlack
description: Two Black women from different generations have a candid conversation about navigating racism in the workplace.

title: Top US general in Afghanistan steps down
description: The top US general in Afghanistan stepped down on Monday as the United States' military withdrawal from the country nears completion.

title: Protests turn to looting in South Africa
description: CNN's David McKenzie reports from the scene as protests against the jailing of former South African President Jacob Zuma turned into looting and violence.

title: Hear what CPAC attendees told CNN's Donie O'Sullivan about Trump
description: CNN's Donie O'Sullivan talks to attendees at the Conservative Political Action Conference's summer gathering in Dallas as former President Donald Trump's influence loomed over the gathering.

title: Racism toward British soccer star a source of national shame, says CNN anchor
description: CNN's Darren Lewis says that the scale of racism toward Marcus Rashford, Bukayo Sako and Jadon Sancho in the wake of England's Euro championship loss is a source of national shame and says UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson's government is not doing enough to combat the issue.

title: 'Surprising amount of deaths' will soon occur in these US regions from increased Covid-19 cases, expert says
description: As the Delta variant rapidly spreads, US hotspots have seen climbing cases -- and an expert warns a "surprising amount" of Covid-19 deaths could soon follow.

title: Richard Branson made it to space. Investors are thrilled
description: Billionaire Richard Branson's successful trip to space is fueling enthusiasm among investors who see an industry primed for takeoff.

title: Looting and killings in South Africa as ex-leader Zuma faces court hearing
description: South Africa's top court began hearing a challenge by former president Jacob Zuma against a 15-month prison term on Monday as police said six people had been killed and more than 200 arrested in related protests and looting since last week.

title: How England manager Gareth Southgate has shown the true value of leadership at Euro 2020
description: When the referee blew the final whistle and confirmed England had reached the final of Euro 2020 on Wednesday, television cameras quickly honed in on Gareth Southgate.

title: Biden calls on Cuban regime to 'hear their people and serve their needs' amid rare protests
description: President Joe Biden on Monday expressed support for the Cuban people amid rare protests in the country over a lack of freedoms and a worsening economy, calling on Cuban President Miguel Diàz-Canel regime to "hear their people and serve their needs."

title: Jason Bateman, Sean Hayes and Will Arnett to bring their 'SmartLess' podcast on the road
description: Jason Bateman, Sean Hayes and Will Arnett will celebrate the first anniversary of their podcast, "SmartLess," by bringing the show on the road.

title: The online abuse of some England footballers following Sunday's Euro 2020 final defeat has been slammed by team manager Gareth Southgate
description:
• Azzurri makes triumphant return to Italy
• Watch fans go crazy in Rome

title: Racist abuse directed at England players is 'unforgivable' says Southgate
Jack Grealish hits back at penalty criticism: 'I wanted to take one!'
description: Football fans often joke that "it's the hope that kills you," though if you're an England fan it's more likely to be a penalty shootout that will result in your metaphorical demise.

title: More manatees have died in the first half of 2021 than in any other year in Florida's history, wildlife agency says
description: A grim prediction for Florida's manatees has come to pass: More manatees have died in the first half of 2021 than ever before in the state's recorded history.

title: 'I'm no Michael Jordan,' says Giannis Antetokounmpo after dominant Game 3 performance to keep NBA Finals hopes alive
description: Fresh off a monster Game 3 performance in the NBA Finals to keep his Milwaukee Bucks alive in the series against the Phoenix Suns, Giannis Antetokounmpo downplayed his own contribution .

title: Untethered to reality, Trump lies over and over about the 2020 election
description: He's still repeating his favorite old lies, those eternal chestnuts about the size of the trade deficit with China and the legitimacy of the Russia investigation and how many immigrants show up for their court hearings.

title: Funeral for slain golf pro Gene Siller to be held Monday
description: Funeral services will be held Monday morning for Gene Siller, the Atlanta-area golf pro who was fatally shot July 3, according his employer, Pinetree Country Club.

title: A weekend of demagoguery shows why Trump can't be ignored
description: Nothing can destroy former President Donald Trump in the eyes of those who love him, one reason why his hold on American politics remains formidable.

title: 'Do you have an actual example?' Keilar spars with former governor
description: Brianna Keilar spars with former Minnesota Governor Tim Pawlenty on extremist behavior shown at CPAC.

title: Western US expecting another day of high temperatures as more than 24 million remain under heat alerts
description: Western states face another sweltering day in a record-breaking heat wave that has more than 24 million people under heat alerts.

title: New poll data on US: Everything has a partisan divide, except this
description: CNN's Harry Enten breaks down data from recent Gallup and Axios/Ipsos polls which show Americans of all stripes are feeling more optimistic about the state of the country.

title: 3 of the youngest victims in the Surfside collapse identified as death toll reaches 90
'We'll do this work as long as it takes': Thompson readies for political fight leading Jan. 6 investigation
description: House Homeland Security Committee Chairman Bennie Thompson avoids making too many promises when it comes to his new select committee to investigate the deadly insurrection at the US Capitol.

title: Ex-top adviser to Jordanian court and king's cousin sentenced to 15 years over alleged royal plot
description: A former top adviser to Jordan's king and a member of the country's royal family have been sentenced to 15 years in prison during a landmark sedition trial that centered on former Crown Prince Hamzah bin al-Hussein.

title: A copy of 'Super Mario 64' sold for over $1.5 million, the most ever paid for a video game
description: A copy of "Super Mario 64" has sold for more than $1.5 million, smashing the record for the most expensive sale ever of a video game at auction.

title: Australian ad showing Covid patient gasping for air sparks backlash as country battles Delta variant
description: A dramatic government health advertisement showing a young woman gasping for air while on a ventilator has sparked a backlash in Australia, with social media users criticizing its targeting of young people for coronavirus vaccination -- the majority of whom are not yet eligible to receive the recommended shot.

title: Azzurri makes triumphant return to Italy
description: The Italian squad made a triumphant return to Italy on Monday after its penalty shootout win over England in the Euro 2020 final at Wembley Stadium.

title: Why Al Sharpton and Ben Crump are taking up the case of a White teen killed by police
description: The Rev. Al Sharpton and Ben Crump are taking up their first case involving a White person who was killed after being shot during an encounter with a police officer.

title: Martin Lawrence's daughter and Eddie Murphy's son are dating
description: Martin Lawrence and Eddie Murphy were a match made in heaven on the big screen -- now their children are writing their own love story.

title: Our dreams are changing as we emerge from the pandemic. Here's how
description: If you thought living through the pandemic was a waking nightmare, just imagine what it's been like in dreams.

title: Conor McGregor feeling 'tremendous' after surgery on broken leg
description: Conor McGregor said he was feeling "tremendous" after undergoing surgery for a broken leg suffered during his trilogy bout with Dustin Poirier on Saturday.

title: Haitian police arrest suspect accused of orchestrating President's assassination
description: Haitian authorities have arrested a man they say helped orchestrate the assassination of President Jovenel Moise, the country's police chief announced on Sunday.

title: Sirisha Bandla, India-born woman and Virgin Galactic executive, flies into space with Richard Branson
description: Indians on Twitter — from top politicians to business executives — are celebrating one of the women who flew to the edge of space along with Richard Branson.

title: At least 11 killed in lightning strike near tourist spot in India
description: At least 11 people were killed in a lightning strike at a popular tourist spot in the city of Jaipur, in India's northern state of Rajasthan, on Sunday evening.

title: Meet the mixologists behind 'Asia's most sustainable bar'
description: At first glance, Penicillin is like any other upscale bar: dimly lit with plush green velvet benches around low tables, guests sipping on cocktails and snacking on bowls of salty chips, with sultry jazz humming in the background.

title: Tokyo hotel apologizes for 'Japanese only' elevator sign
description: A Tokyo hotel has apologized and removed signs reading "Japanese only" and "foreigners only" from elevators after the anti-COVID-19 precaution sparked outrage on social media ahead of the 2020 Summer Olympics.

title: Scientists are trying to control lightning with a massive laser
description: A team of researchers from the University of Geneva has hauled a huge laser atop a mountain to shoot it at the sky, and act as a high-tech lightning rod.

title: Mystery buyer spends $12.3M on a 101-carat diamond -- and pays in cryptocurrency
description: A 101-carat diamond has become the most expensive jewel ever purchased with cryptocurrency, according to Sotheby's, the auction house behind the sale.

title: One of China's wandering elephants has finally made it home. But problems exposed by the herd's journey aren't going away
description: Editor's note: CNN has launched the Meanwhile in China newsletter, a three-times-a-week update exploring what you need to know about the country's rise and how it impacts the world. Sign up here.

title: US warns China over South China Sea, sends destroyer near Paracel Islands
description: United States Secretary of State Antony Blinken has reaffirmed the US' commitment to defend the Philippines' armed forces from attack in the South China Sea, under a 70-year-old mutual defense treaty.

title: After Didi's disastrous IPO, China looks to extend its control over overseas listings
description: China's crackdown on Big Tech just keeps growing.

title: World's largest astronomy museum set to open in Shanghai
description: The world's largest astronomy museum is opening in Shanghai, and its complex curvilinear shape has been designed to reflect the geometry of the cosmos. With no straight lines or right angles used throughout, the structure is instead formed from three overlapping arcs that allude to the orbits of celestial bodies.

title: India's most populous state pushes for two-child policy
description: India's most populous state, Uttar Pradesh, has proposed legislation that aims to discourage couples from having more than two children, becoming the second state ruled by Prime Minister Narendra Modi's party to make such a proposal.

title: Chinese university plans dividing Hungary
description: A derelict plot on the banks of the Danube River in Budapest, Hungary, might seem like an unusual epicenter for a political earthquake.

title: Trump airs post-election grievances in CPAC address
description: Former President Donald Trump played his greatest hits during an address to attendees at the Conservative Political Action Conference in Dallas. CNN's Sara Murray has more.
